INTRO.DESCRIPTION: We strengthen your academic career with our academic support

ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Our academic staff is here to support and give service to you for your requirements. You can see our services from here.
ABOUT.CONTACT: You can reach us via e-mail or social networks presented in our web site
ABOUT.REPLY: We'll respond as soon as possible.

TAYFUN.NAME: OSMAN TAYFUN BİŞKİN
TAYFUN.DESCRIPTION: After his undergraduate and graduate education in electrical and electronics engineering he is continuing his Ph.D. education now. He has academic experience in various universities. He was a guest researcher at CERN.

HAZAR.NAME: HAZAR ALTINBAŞ
HAZAR.DESCRIPTION: PhD. candidate in Business Administration. Bachelor degree at Industrial Engineering, master degree at finance, onging master at industrial engineer. He has 6 years of experience. He has studies with international researchers.
HAZAR.TOOL_3: C, C++, M.S. Excel VBA, Pascal

BURAK.NAME: BURAK ÖÇLÜ
BURAK.DESCRIPTION: He got his bechalor degree in Business Administration, Marmara University and his master degree in Supply Chain Management, Istanbul University. In Business Administration, he had been applied many studies for 1 years in Germany. He is interested in E-commerce activities. He created many e-business websites in order to stock management, order management, and logistics activities.

SERVICE_ONE.TITLE: Editing Thesis
SERVICE_ONE.DESCRIPTION: Reeditting your thesis, paper, book, etc. according to guidelines, table of contents- figures- tables creation, adding references and bibliography, page numbering and formatting İn M.S. WORD, LATEX or any word processing software. You can also refer us for tracing of your submission processes.

SERVICE_TWO.TITLE: Data Editing/ Analysis
SERVICE_TWO.DESCRIPTION: Excel Pivot Table creation and formulations and statistical analyses in SPSS, R, VBA Makro and MATLAB softwares along with reports and exporting to other file extensitons.

SERVICE_THREE.TITLE: Algorithm Construction, Mathematical Calculation, Optimization
SERVICE_THREE.DESCRIPTION: Algortihm designs for your analyses, improving/correcting your algorithms, mathematicla and probabilistic optimization, approaches to complex and NP_Hard problems with evalutionary and meta-heuristic algorithms.

SERVICE_FOUR.TITLE: Building E-Commerce Web Sites and Management
SERVICE_FOUR.DESCRIPTION: İnternet üzerinden veri toplama, anket uygulamaları

SERVICE_SIX.TITLE: Simulation Studies
SERVICE_SIX.DESCRIPTION: Simulation of real world porblems, searching for optimization with design and development studies.

SERVICE_SEVEN.TITLE: Turkish- English Text Checks
SERVICE_SEVEN.DESCRIPTION: You can rely us for last checks of your texts.

CONTACT.CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: You can contact us whenever you want. We will respond you as soon as possible.
CONTACT.SUBJECT: Subject
CONTACT.SEND_SUCCESS: Your message is recieved successfully. We are going to resond as soon as possible.
CONTACT.SEND_FAIL: We encountered with an error. Please try again later.
